Post: "I'm so tired of feeling like I'm stuck in this rut. No matter how hard I try, I can't seem to escape the feelings of self-hatred and dissatisfaction that have been plaguing me for years. I feel like I'm just going through the motions of life without any real purpose or direction. And worst of all, I can't help but feel like it's all my own fault. Like, what's the point of even trying if everything is just going to stay the same? It's like, no matter how hard I try to change, I'm still stuck in this same old pattern. It's like, why bother? Why bother with anything? It's all just a futile attempt at trying to find some semblance of happiness in a world that's just so messed up and unfair. It's like, I can't even escape my own thoughts and feelings. They're always there, lurking in the background, waiting to pounce on me and drag me down. And it's not like anyone understands what I'm going through. They all just think I'm being dramatic or attention-seeking. But they don't get it. They don't get how hard it is to live in a world that's so against me. It's like, I can't even find any solace in death. That's how hopeless I feel. That's how much I feel like there's no way out of this misery. It's like, I just want to disappear, to cease existing altogether. But even that feels like a distant dream, a fleeting fantasy that'll never come to pass. So, what's the point? What's the point of any of it?"

And it's hard not to feel like it's all my fault. It's like, what's the point of trying if everything stays the same? It feels like I'm trapped in a pattern that I can't escape. It's frustrating and disheartening. I feel like I can't even find solace in death sometimes. It's like, I just want to disappear, to cease existing altogether. But even that feels out of reach. It's a tough spot to be in, and it's hard to see a way out of this misery.
